title: Hurricane Media Myths, Post-COVID Korn = Bummer 8.31.21
itunes:title: Hurricane Media Myths, Post-COVID Korn = Bummer 8.31.21
description:
In episode 980, Jack and Miles are joined by writer and Deckheads: Chief Stews co-host Molly Lambert to discuss Hurricane Ida relief, how walking is for liberals, Korn's Jonathan Davis continuing to struggle from COVID, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. The Cajun Navy
  2. "Cajun Navy" volunteers race to help in Ida's wake
  3. Cantrell urges people to remain sheltered, implementing anti-looting protocols in darkened city
  4. There Goes Hurricane Florence; Here Come the Disaster Myths
  5. Liberal Democrats prefer walkable communities, conservative Republicans prefer drivable communities
  6. KORN'S JONATHAN DAVIS STILL STRUGGLING FROM COVID ... Needs Oxygen Onstage
  7. LISTEN: Paris Texas - FORCE OF HABIT (Official Video)
